title: Bank regulatory revisions pose dangers and could lead to financial crisis: critics
text: Is the US condemned to repeat the past? While the economy remains the strongest it has been in years, concern is growing that recent revisions to the country’s banking regulations could bring an end to the current record-long bull market.

title: Don’t fear a recession — the economy is looking solid and stable
text: One of the hardest things to understand about the current economy is that we are in a good, solid place — but not a perfect one.

title: Fed Should Cut Rates at Next Three Meetings, Economist Swonk Says
text: Diane Swonk, Grant Thornton chief economist, discusses the outlook for Federal Reserve monetary policy with Bloomberg's Caroline Hyde on "Bloomberg Markets: The Close."

title: Bullish trend suggests the market's win streak is just starting
text: Four out of the last five times this has happened, Bespoke's Paul Hickey finds stocks grabbed big gains.

title: A Big Mistake China's Political Elite Makes In Fighting The Trade War
text: Unless Beijing recognizes that it isn’t in power parity with the US, it will be hard for the two sides to reach a trade deal anytime soon.

title: Worried About A Recession? Relax.
text: Everyone seems to be worried about an oncoming recession. While the daily drumbeat of negative news is worth paying attention to, it is somewhat of a sideshow.

title: Investing Insights: Retiree Traps, a Wide-Moat Stock Pick, and Indexing Risks
text: In this week’s podcast, we examine CVS, American Funds' equity lineup, and recession concerns.

title: You might be invested in gun stocks. Here's how to tell
text: Even if you haven't actively sought to own stocks with ties to weapons, you could have some exposure. Here's what you need to know to assess what you have.

title: 'We can't really buy into' the bond yield bounce, says Wells Fargo rate strategist
text: Don't trust the rebound rally in bond yields, warns Michael Schumacher, global head of rate strategy at Wells Fargo Securities.

title: Trump's recession toolkit could include tax cuts and infrastructure spending
text: As signs of economic deceleration mount President Trump may want to refer to the actions of prior administrations as a guide.

title: Global Economy Forecast: Not As Bad For The U.S. As Headlines Imply
text: The global economy is growing moderately, but that’s a great deal better than news headlines imply. World GDP is likely to expand by 2.8 percent his year, inflation adjusted.

title: Genel Energy Is Still Astoundingly Undervalued
text: Genel Energy is still drastically undervalued (e.g., EV/EBITDA of 1.79x) despite a plethora of improvements in 1H19; the stock is the cheapest among peers.

title: PrimaryBid closes $8.6M round for its platform aimed to help retail investors
text: PrimaryBid, a UK-regulated platform connecting publicly listed companies with everyday investors for discounted share issuances has previously raised $3M. It’s now upped those stakes with an $8.6M funding round, led by UK VCs Pentech and Outward VC with participation from new and existing investors.

title: How Tweet-Risk Can Infect Your Stock Investing, And How To Avoid Harm
text: President Trump's tariff period has had high tweet-caused, potentially harmful volatility
